text: Arjun Tendulkar is an Indian cricketer. He is the son of legendary cricketer Sachin Tendulkar and has gained attention for his own cricketing skills. Arjun has shown promise as an all-rounder, contributing with both bat and ball. He plays for Mumbai Indians in Indian Premier League. == References == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Marathi people Category:Gujarati people
title: Arjun Tendulkar
